name: Kanta Matsuura
content: Kanta Matsuura's home page Kanta Matsuura Japanese version is here. Personal Information Professor, 3rd Department, Institute of Industrial Science, the University of Tokyo. Location / Address Room No.Ee-403 / TEL:+81-3-5452-6284 Research Interest Cryptography, Information Security, Security Management Degree Ph.D. (from Graduate School of Electronics Engineering, The University of Tokyo) Thesis: "Linear Estimation of Multiple Signal Sources in the Biomagnetic Inverse Problem" Membership of Academic Society IEEE ACM Society for Computational Economics IEICE(Japan) IPSJ(Japan) JSSM (Japan Society of Security Management) Hobbies Fishing (Surf Casting) Sports Speciality Middle and Long Distance Race of Track & Field (personal records are: 400m---52"5, 800m---1'58"0, 1500m---4'09"1, 5000m---15'28"2, 10000m---32'21"0, Marathon---2:26:54, competed in the final trial for the Sydney Olympic Games, final trial for the Athene Olympec Games, 33rd at 89th Japan Chanpionship) Back Back to Toppage Matsuura Laboratory/ Department of Informatics and Electronics / Institute of Industrial Science, The University of Tokyo/ 4-6-1 Komaba, Meguro-ku, Tokyo 153-8505, Japan
